lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The conservatives gained nine new seats in parliament after the two-day elections, which ended yesterday, and political commentators say social democrat Prime Minister Kalevi Sorsa is likely to be replaced by a centre-right coalition.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said Finnish conservatives bore little resemblance to other European conservative movements and had, for example, shelved privatisation policies to increase their popularity.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Securities analysts said the market would respond positively if a centre-right coalition was formed, but added it was too early to exclude the possibility that social democrats would hang on to power.
